name: Dork's Dilemma
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Anthony J. Clarke - Micro Projects Ltd. and Gremlin Graphics. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5 by László Rajcsányi (WLS)

Original Story:

Plasma rocket failure. A space shattering collision with a planetiod form not known to any civilised solar system and a dazed, confused Dork awakens to find his disabled spaceship stripped and hidden throughout the underworld kingdom of the evil little Zobwats. Zobwots? Zobwats! Dark little creatures living in an underground maze.

And they told Dork spacetravel was supposed to be fun.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Drop a bomb: A or B  
Map: Select

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Drop a bomp: Ctrl / X  / Z or Alt
Map: Shift

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Dorks_Dilemma

This game has been entered into the following contests with permission from the original creator (Anthony J. Clarke): https://itch.io/jam/remake-jam-2022

Thanks Anthony for the positive feedback and blessing!
